canonical_signals.signal: You must pay $100 by Friday if the deal closes; it's likely rainy, so plan accordingly.
This function must return an integer.
Always verify the user's age before proceeding.
The tenant shall not sublet the premises without written consent.
You must wear a helmet while cycling.
Employees are required to submit reports by end of day.
Do not enter without authorization.
If the alarm sounds, you must evacuate immediately.
A prime number is defined as an integer greater than 1 with no divisors other than 1 and itself.
The API must handle up to 1000 concurrent requests.
Parties shall comply with all applicable laws.
All passwords must be at least 8 characters long.
The system shall log all access attempts.
No food or drink in the laboratory.
You must complete training before operating equipment.
The budget cannot exceed $5000.
Participants must sign the consent form prior to the study.
Code must adhere to PEP 8 style guidelines.
Employees shall report any safety hazards immediately.
Vehicles must stop at red lights.
